title: $:/litClock/times/-19:56-Jorge Luis Borges
quote_first: I remember the cigarette in his hard face, against the now limitless storm cloud. Bernardo cried to him unexpectedly: ‘What time is it, Ireno?’ Without consulting the sky, without stopping, he replied: ‘It’s
quote_last: , young Bernardo Juan Franciso.’ His voice was shrill, mocking.
